title: Windows 11 taskbar behavior not what it used to be for Firefox, Please help?
content: On Windows 11 I used to be able to click on the Firefox icon on the taskbar to open Firefox which still works however when bringing Firefox back to the foreground after being minimized or in the background of another app it will only give me the option to select one of the tabs that I have open instead of just opening it back up to the previous tab I was on... Is there a way to fix this? This doesn't happen with Edge or Chrome...

title: When I download a pdf from ebay and try to open it with firefox or adobe it is saying undefined
content: When I download a pdf from ebay and try to open it with firefox or adobe it is saying undefined I can open other pdf's with no problem , I have contacted ebay and they have indicated that the problem is not on their system , I have obviously altered something and don't know how to reverse it , previously it would open the ebay PDF's no bother ,can you advise what the settings should be
creator: muppet10

title: Bookmark Multiple Tabs into A Single Folder Has Stopped Working
content: Several months ago I lost the ability to bookmark multiple tabs into a new Folder. When I perform the procedure and give the new folder a unique name, the selected bookmarks appear in the generic "Bookmarks Menu" section and the folder I specified with the unique name is created but is empty. Also, I cannot even store a single tab to an existing folder of Bookmarks. When I select the existing folder after CNTRL+D, the bookmark just goes to my generic "Bookmarks Menu" section and not to the existing folder I selected. I have reloaded Firefox but the problem continues. Can someone help me? Thanks.
creator: bobdawsonvenice

title: Most recentFirefox update 118.0.2 of Oct 10 caused comments on a website made though Disqus to be invisible.
content: The update of Sep 28 (118.0.1) on another machine works fine, as does that awful Windows Edge on this machine. I read the notes to 118.0.2 but they offer no hints to me. Could someone check and refix the bug fix? Or something. Thanks. Probably irrelevant but I'm running Windows 11 on a year-old HP laptop.
